title: Snapseed 1.2 (Mac App Store)

FEATURES:
== Basic Adjustments ==
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tune Image - Easily browse and adjust your photos with a single click using Auto Correct, tweak your photos to perfection with Tune Image or selectively adjust specific areas of them with revolutionary Control Points. Use Ambience to create depth and vibrancy that uniquely adapts to colors and textures. Adjust White Balance, Saturation, Contrast, more.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Crop, Straighten & Rotate - Rotate 90Ã‚Â° and/or straighten photos and easily crop images to remove distracting parts of your photo. Now includes standard aspect ratios.

== Creative Enhancements ==
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Black & White - Get that classic Black and White look with this darkroom-inspired filter.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Vintage - Make any photo look like a vintage color film photo from the 50Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s, 60Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s or 70Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drama - Add style with a custom effect specifically tailored to your photos.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Grunge - Give your photos a totally unique, hip, and dingy look.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tilt & Shift - Create the classic compressed depth of field look of a miniature set or emulate the swings and tilts of a large format camera.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Details - Enhance details with traditional sharpening or the unique Structure control found in the Nik Software professional products.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Center Focus - Draw attention to the subject of your photo by blurring the surrounding background.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Frames - Add stylized borders to photos for the perfect finishing touch.

Get started quickly with help overlays, tutorial guide, and videos. If you ever get stuck, our support team can help.
